jgame.controller

Class OscillationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • jgame.controller.OscillationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class OscillationController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    A controller that allows for rotational oscillation about an object's anchor point, according to a sinusoidal function.
    Author:
    William Chargin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double center
      The center of the controller's oscillation, in degrees.
      private int period
      The full period, in frames.
      private double range
      The range of the controller's oscillation, in degrees.
      private int t
      The current time in the period.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OscillationController(double center, double range, int period)
      Creates the controller with the specified center, range, and period.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void controlObject(GObject target, Context context)
      Performs one iteration of controlling the specified object in the given context.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • center

        private double center
        The center of the controller's oscillation, in degrees. Default is 0.

      • range

        private double range
        The range of the controller's oscillation, in degrees. Default is 90.

      • period

        private int period
        The full period, in frames. Default is 30.

      • t

        private int t
        The current time in the period.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OscillationController

        public OscillationController(double center,
                             double range,
                             int period)
        Creates the controller with the specified center, range, and period.
        Parameters:
        center - the center of oscillation
        range - the range of oscillation
        period - the period, in frames, of a complete oscillation
